name: Hide your NUTS!
description:
Hide Your Nuts is a game about life as a teenager! Games, TV, questionable magazines! And a strict mother... Two players try to trick each other in a versus battle of a different kind. One takes the role of the mother, the other takes the role of her teenage son. As the mother has to fulfill household chores, cook, and check on her son, the teenager tries to make the best of his weekend by stress relief activities of various kinds. Each activity leaves trash behind the teen should clean up. If he fails to do so and gets caught by his mother, she will get gradually more pissed. In turn, the son tries to be the least stressed. Who will win this mental battle?
